Welcome to Workshop.

We're creating an entrepreneur factory in State College. A place where ideas mean nothing, execution is everything, and the #1 thing needed to have a business is a paying customer. We're not looking for the smartest, most talented or most successful people. We're looking for those who aren't afraid to work hard and learn.

Imagine a place where you're surrounded by people like you, who spend every waking hour with a burning desire to pursue their dreams and build something amazing. People who KNOW they were built for something big.

I'm Jack, and I'm one of those crazy people. In fact it's 3am as I'm writing this because I can't sleep thinking about how freakin awesome this is going to be.

We have currently stopped accepting new applications, but will be reopening shortly. Click on the button below to add yourself to the mailing list. We'll notify you ASAP.
